values.title: Health
values.description: We strive for everyone to have a quality and long life filled with energy

values.title: Safety
values.description: We explain each exercise and monitor the correct technique

values.title: Systematic Approach
values.description: The desired result depends on a systematic approach and discipline. Thanks to this, we form healthy habits

values.title: Individuality
values.description: Each person is special. And we take this into account in every training session.

values.title: Culture
values.description: We believe that respect should be both for oneself and for others

values.title: Development and Innovation
values.description: We constantly monitor new trends, add new types of activities, and our trainers continuously improve their qualifications

rules.description: Treat studio trainers and other visitors with respect.
Use changeable shoes and clothes. Clothes should be clean and comfortable
Pre-registration is mandatory (done on the website through personal account login)
You can cancel registration for a group class no later than 3 hours before it starts. Morning training registration is done until 9 PM

classes.title: Functional
classes.description: Strength training using dumbbells, elastic bands, and/or body weight. It comprehensively works all muscles of the body, focusing on muscle definition.

classes.title: Tabata
classes.description: Cardio-strength intensive training within time frames. 20 seconds - exercises, 10 seconds - rest. For those who want to lose weight and burn more calories during the workout.

classes.title: ABS
classes.description: Strength training. A set of exercises for the muscles of the abdomen, thighs, buttocks, and lower back.

classes.title: Healthy Back
classes.description: Low-intensity training aimed at developing back mobility, light stretching, and safe strengthening of the muscle corset. Corrective and preventive training direction.

classes.title: Pilates
classes.description: Comprehensive training aimed at developing and strengthening muscles. Includes elements of static positions, strength exercises, stretching, and detailed work on deep muscles.

classes.title: Yoga
classes.description: A set of asanas (poses) that combine moderately dynamic and static positions, breathing exercises, and stretching. Practices awaken, energize, and set you up for a productive day.

classes.title: Stretching
classes.description: A direction for stretching the muscles of the whole body. Increases range of motion, relaxes. Perfect for compensating for strength training.

classes.title: Fly Stretching
classes.description: Stretching on hammocks. A combination of balance exercises to engage deep muscles along with classic stretching.

classes.title: Yoga Stretching
classes.description: A set of yoga asanas aimed at conscious stretching of the muscles of the whole body, improving mobility. Working with breathing.

classes.title: Heels
classes.description: Dance direction on heels. To release and discover femininity, sexuality, and grace.

trainings.title: Group Training
trainings.description: Training with a coach in a group of up to 8 people.
